text: Getty LADY GAGA FACE LIFT? The singer sparked plastic surgery rumours at the Grammys The Joanne singer turned heads when she arrived at the Grammy Awards 2018 in a nude ambition gown. * * LADY GAGA'NEW FACE'GRAMMYS 2018 TREND * While her red carpet style was undoubtedly a hit, many fans were far too distracted by Lady Gaga's physical transformation to comment on her wardrobe choices. Following her appearance at the event, held in New York City's Madison Square Gardens, the search term ` ` Lady Gaga face lift'' started trending on Google.
